name: Galaxy Taxi
description:
In the sparsely populated corners of the galaxy, where planetary civilizations are just starting to take shape, your intrepid ship cuts through the Space Silence.

You’re a Pilot for one of the sector’s most popular taxi services. You help stranded beings get to their destinations, sure. But in this lonely universe, in the backseat of your shuttle, if you create a welcoming environment - these lifeforms might just begin to open up to you. 

If you’re there for them, massive tips will flow freely into your Space Wallet (and in the Space Gig Economy, tips are everything). Take the wrong turns, emotionally, and when you next pry open that nearly empty Space Wallet, the only thing to emerge will be one sad little cyberfly.

Can you help them find their way, and themselves?
